trans-unit.source: The base class from which HTTP modules that are configurable with the [\<system.identityModel.services\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.identityModel.services%3E.md) element (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection"></xref>) derive.
trans-unit.target: 從哪些 HTTP 模組所使用的基底類別[ \<system.identityModel.services\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.identityModel.services%3E.md)元素 (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection"></xref>) 衍生。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources (except memory) used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 釋放目前的執行個體所使用的資源 （除了記憶體） <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"> </xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in your derived class to release resources.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法來釋放資源衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation is empty.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作是空的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for the current module.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref>實際上是為目前模組的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for the current module.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref>實際上是為目前模組的物件。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the HTTP module.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 HTTP 模組。

trans-unit.source: This method implements the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method by initializing the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> method, and then invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會實作<xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法初始化<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>屬性設為值的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A>方法，然後再叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 衍生類別覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application object which contains this module.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式物件，其中包含此模組。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initializes the current module and prepares it to handle events from its ASP.NET application object.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，初始化目前的模組，並準備好裝置以處理來自其 ASP.NET 應用程式物件的事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the InitializeModule method to load any additional configuration state as well as to register event handling methods with specific events raised by the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 InitializeModule 方法來載入有關註冊事件處理方法向特定事件所引發的任何額外的設定狀態<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>物件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫此方法是從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>方法，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>屬性尚未初始化。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得此模組，這個屬性就是作用中的組態物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property should be used for all token processing in this module.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>屬性應該用於此模組中的所有權杖處理。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application object which contains this module.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式物件，其中包含此模組。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initializes module properties based on values in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for it.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，初始化中的值為基礎的模組屬性<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref>就是作用中的物件。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫此方法是從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>方法，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>屬性尚未初始化。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得此模組，這個屬性就是作用中的組態物件。
